scripts.clean: yarn run clean:root && yarn run clean:client && yarn run clean:server
scripts.install:client: cd ./client && echo 'Installing client packages...' && yarn install
scripts.install:server: cd ./server && echo 'Installing server packages...' && yarn install
scripts.latest: yarn run latest:root && yarn run latest:client && yarn run latest:server
scripts.latest:client: cd ./client && echo 'Upgrading client packages to latest...' && yarn --latest upgrade
scripts.latest:root: echo 'Upgrading root packages to latest...' && yarn --latest upgrade
scripts.latest:server: cd ./server && echo 'Upgrading server packages to latest...' && yarn --latest upgrade
scripts.postinstall: yarn run install:client && yarn run install:server && yarn run install:mongo
scripts.update: git checkout master && git pull upstream master
